mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE , TB.USERNO, USERNM BRDWRITER, BGNAME, TB.BGNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBG.BGDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT TB.BRDNO, LEFT(TB.BRDTITLE, 10) BRDTITLE, UF_DATETIME2STRING(REDATE) BRDDATE FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY REDATE DESC LIMIT 20
